d: This is the bib that you can create by following our design tutorial

neckRatio.d: Controls the size of the neck opening relative to the bib size

widthRatio.d: Bepaalt de breedte van het slabbetje

lengthRatio.d: Bepaalt de lengte van het slabbetje

headSize.d: The head circumference you want the bib to accomodate
